mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (id, user_acct, user_name, sex, phone, email, id_card, is_deleted, sort_no, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, version, user_pwd ) values (#{id}, #{userAcct}, #{userName}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{idCard}, #{isDeleted}, 0, now(), #{createBy}, NOW(), #{createBy}, 0, #{userPwd})
mapper.update: update t_sys_user set user_acct= #{userAcct} where id=1
mapper.select: select user_acct,user_name,sex,role_name from t_sys_user t join t_role_user_middle tru on t.id=tru.user_id left join t_sys_role tr on tru.role_id=tr.id;
mapper.update: update t_sys_user set is_deleted=#{isDeleted} where user_acct=#{userAcct}
